question: Paracrine signals move by what method through the extracellular matrix?

nodes.text: Osmosis is the method by which paracrine signals move through the extracellular matrix.
Deposition is the method by which paracrine signals move through the extracellular matrix.
Transfusion is the method by which paracrine signals move through the extracellular matrix.
Diffusion is the method by which paracrine signals move through the extracellular matrix.
